Positional audio demo

Controls

  • Move with WASD or Arrows
  • Click and drag to rotate the camera
  • Press F to hear the red ball (Forgotten love by AURORA)
  • Stand under the green ball to start it (Behind Closed Doors by Rise Against)
  • The purple ball is always playing (Everlong Acoustic version by Foo Fighters)
  • Press C to start hearing yourself from the blue ball (on key up the volume will be 0)
  • Movile controls soon

By default the gain obtained or the volumen decrease by this formula


inverse: An inverse distance model calculating the gain induced by the distance according to:


refDistance / (refDistance + rolloffFactor * (Math.max(distance, refDistance) - refDistance))


this is the inverse distance model, which is the one that ThreeJS use by default
